sentences.en: He's only 17 and therefore not eligible to vote.
sentences.cn: 他只有17岁，因此没有投票选举的资格。

sentences.en: Muscle cells need lots of fuel and therefore burn lots of calories.
sentences.cn: 肌肉细胞需要很多“燃料”，并因此燃烧大量卡路里。

sentences.en: They had seen him trawling and therefore knew that there were fish.
sentences.cn: 他们看见他正用拖网捕鱼，因此他们知道那里有鱼。
